resources.string: An audio analyzer for your Android phone.

Audalyzer is a toy spectrum analyser for your phone. Since microphone sensitivity varies between individual devices, let alone models, it's impossible to generate accurate sound level readings with this app; so all data should be taken with a pinch of salt. dB levels are relative to the maximum input level of your device. Still, it may be interesting when used to compare sound readings at different locations.
